name: Light/Source PAX Demo 2017
description:
ATTENTION: This is currently a not optimised build and was built specifically for our development machines, this may cause issues on some PC's.

Light/Source is a top down action stealth game that puts you in control of a thief whose job is to get in and out unseen. The demo here is a reconstructed build of the one we lost (due to unforeseen circumstances) just before PAX AUS and therefore is very basic in its premise.

We are releasing this demo due to public demand and have included a feedback form (link below) where you can give player feedback on the direction to take our game. The game has already gone through a massive overhaul and will continue to do so,  with your feedback and help.

The donation pricing has been added - if you wish to support us, you can; any support is appreciated but just downloading, playing, and giving feedback is amazing for us.

Objectives:

Get the Keycard from the Guard Tower
Enter the Warehouse and Locate the Manifest
Steal the Package
Escape! (Exit is at the bottom of the map)

Controls:

WASD - Move
E - Interact
LMB - Toggle Torch
